mapper.select: SELECT id, isDefault, DATE_FORMAT(from_date, '%m-%d') as `from`, DATE_FORMAT(to_date, '%c-%e') as `to`, fk_placeId as `placeId` FROM WORKING_SCHEDULES WHERE fk_placeId=#{targetPlaceId}
SELECT id, fk_scheduleId as `scheduleId`, openDay, openTime, closeDay, closeTime, lastAccommodation FROM PERIODS WHERE fk_scheduleId=#{id}
